title: Anyone seen this one before?
content:
Looking for a name or place I could get this font from (Africa)...

[http://www.nationalgeographic.com/africa/](http://web.archive.org/web/20071013234214/http:/www.nationalgeographic.com/africa/ "http://www.nationalgeographic.com/africa/")

Thanks!

 [‹ Futura Condensed-like typeface--anyone know what this is?](http://web.archive.org/web/20071013234214/http:/typophile.com/node/12368 "Go to previous forum topic") [Swat 4 Title Font ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071013234214/http:/typophile.com/node/12353 "Go to next forum topic")
author: michaeljamesyork

comments.content: I think we’ve seen this one before and concluded it was custom created.
